events.label: Cambrian Explosion
events.description: Rapid diversification of multicellular life; trilobites, brachiopods emerge
events.indianRecord: Limited Cambrian fossils in Himalayan terranes; India part of Gondwana margin
events.culturalCorrelation: Pre-Vedic deep time; cosmic cycles of creation (sṛṣṭi)

events.label: Ordovician Marine Radiation
events.description: Diversification of marine invertebrates, early vertebrates
events.indianRecord: Spiti Shale fossils (Himachal Pradesh); Tethyan seafloor
events.culturalCorrelation: Ocean as primordial matrix (samudra manthana echoes)

events.label: Permian-Triassic Extinction (P-Tr)
events.description: Earth's worst mass extinction (~90% marine species lost); Siberian Traps volcanism implicated
events.indianRecord: Gondwana coal measures boundary; Glossopteris extinction; India near South Pole
events.culturalCorrelation: Pralaya (cosmic dissolution); fire and flood mythology
references: Retallack et al. 2006 - P-Tr boundary in Karoo/India

events.label: Triassic Biotic Recovery
events.description: Ecosystems rebuild after P-Tr; early dinosaurs and mammals appear
events.culturalCorrelation: Rebirth after pralaya; new yuga begins

events.label: Jurassic Dinosaur Dominance
events.description: Sauropods and theropods dominate terrestrial ecosystems
events.indianRecord: Kota Formation dinosaurs (Barapasaurus, Kotasaurus); Gondwana interior
events.culturalCorrelation: Giant beings (rākṣasa, asura) in epic literature; mythic megafauna
references: Jain et al. 1979 - Indian Jurassic dinosaurs

events.label: Gondwana Fragmentation Begins
events.description: Supercontinent Gondwana starts splitting; Africa-South America rift opens
events.indianRecord: India remains attached to Antarctica-Australia; Rajmahal Traps volcanism
events.culturalCorrelation: Continents as scattered islands (dvīpa); cosmic ocean expands

events.label: India-Madagascar Separation
events.description: India rifts from Madagascar, begins northward journey toward Asia
events.indianRecord: Marion hotspot track; rifting evidence in Western Ghats
events.culturalCorrelation: Bhāratavarṣa as moving landmass; dvīpa migration

events.label: Deccan Traps Eruptions Begin
events.description: Massive flood basalt eruptions (~1 million km³); Réunion hotspot
events.indianRecord: Western Ghats basalt stacks >2 km thick; India over Réunion plume
events.culturalCorrelation: Cosmic fire (agni); world-ending conflagration; transformation through fire
references: Renne et al. 2015 - Deccan timing and K-Pg

events.label: K-Pg Mass Extinction
events.description: Chicxulub impact + Deccan volcanism; non-avian dinosaurs extinct
events.indianRecord: Lameta Formation boundary; dinosaur eggs in situ; iridium anomaly
events.culturalCorrelation: Pralaya; yuga transition; death and rebirth cycle
references: Wilson et al. 2003 - Indian K-Pg sites

events.label: Paleocene Mammal Radiation
events.description: Mammals diversify rapidly in dinosaur-free world
events.indianRecord: Limited Indian Paleocene fauna; island isolation phase
events.culturalCorrelation: New creation after pralaya; smaller beings inherit earth
references: Rose et al. 2014 - Early Paleocene mammals

events.label: India-Asia Initial Contact
events.description: Indian Plate collides with Eurasian Plate; Himalayan orogeny begins
events.culturalCorrelation: Himālaya as 'abode of snow'; cosmic axis (meru); north as sacred direction

events.label: Major Himalayan Uplift Phase
events.description: Rapid mountain building; Tibetan Plateau rises; monsoon intensifies
events.indianRecord: Fold-thrust belts active; foreland basin subsidence begins
events.culturalCorrelation: Birth of sacred mountains; gods dwell on peaks; Gaṅgā descent from heaven

events.label: Siwalik Group Deposition Begins
events.description: Foreland basin fills with Himalayan erosional products; rich fossil record
events.indianRecord: Lower Siwalik (~16 Ma) → Upper Siwalik (~2.6 Ma); complete chronicle
events.culturalCorrelation: Living fossil library; earth as archive; stones as memory

events.label: Siwalik Megafauna Peak
events.description: Maximum diversity of Siwalik fauna; Stegodon, Sivatherium, Hipparion herds
events.indianRecord: Middle Siwalik fossil bonebeds; predator-prey ecosystems
events.culturalCorrelation: Age of giants; mythic megafauna in folklore

events.label: Monsoon Intensification
events.description: South Asian monsoon strengthens due to Tibetan Plateau uplift
events.indianRecord: Shift to C4 grasslands in Siwalik record; isotope evidence
events.culturalCorrelation: Monsoon as cosmic rhythm; Varṣā (rainy season) sanctity

events.label: Early Hominins in Siwaliks
events.description: Ramapithecus and early hominid ancestors; bipedalism evolving
events.indianRecord: Contested Siwalik hominin status; possible Miocene ape ancestors
events.culturalCorrelation: Human origins narratives; Manu as progenitor

events.label: Quaternary Ice Ages Begin
events.description: Cyclic glacial-interglacial periods; sea level fluctuations
events.indianRecord: Himalayan glaciation; Narmadā terraces record climate shifts
events.culturalCorrelation: Cycles of time (yuga); ice as frozen time

events.label: Narmadā Hominin
events.description: Homo erectus narmadensis - India's oldest human fossil; Acheulean tools
events.culturalCorrelation: Ancient humans on sacred river; Narmadā as witness

events.label: Holocene Begins
events.description: Current interglacial period; climate stabilization enables agriculture
events.indianRecord: IVC emergence (5000 BP); Ghaggar-Hakra paleochannel active
events.culturalCorrelation: Current yuga; Vedic civilization; historical memory begins
